import React, { Component } from 'react' import Iframe from 'react-iframe' import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch' import Extra from './Extra' class Playlist extends Component { render() { const { currentYear, issuePlaylist } = this.props const { spotify, nickname, artist, background, issue } = issuePlaylist console.log('issue', issue) const imageBackground = { backgroundImage: 'url(' + 'http://3.21.165.5:1337/' + background.url + ')', } return (
issue#{ issue.Number }

by { nickname } { artist }
